name: AirTouch
0:
”Alexa, set Upstairs to cool mode”
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen”
”Alexa, set Bedroom to 26 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enable the skill and log in your AirTouch device account, to control your AirTouch system using your voice. 

This skill, when used in conjunction with AirTouch Smart Air Conditioning Control System, is designed to give you unequaled control of your home air conditioning. 

It provides most of the functions which are already via the wall mounted touchscreen. 

•Turn on and off the AC (if configured or with gateway connected)
•Change the temperature setpoint (with gateway connected)
•Change the AC mode to cool/heat (with gateway connected)
•Turn on and off zones
•Control temperature for individual zones (if temperature sensors installed)
•Enquire status of AC and zones(On/Off, Heat/Cool, temperature and set point)
Once your AirTouch system has been installed with your air conditioning system, simply connect the operating module to your WiFi network, bind the module to your Amazon Alexa device and you are ready to go.
 
For more information, support or feedback, please visit https://www.airtouch.net.au/enquire
